title: Face with Open Mouth

adjectives: Deeply or markedly affected or influenced
Feeling that something unexpected has happened.
Feeling or showing surprise because taken unawares or suddenly.
Caused to feel surprise, amazement or wonder, or showing an emotion due to an unexpected event.
Taken unawares or suddenly and feeling wonder or astonishment
That is or are a surprise.
Causing surprise or wonder or amazement
Causing surprise or wonder or amazement.
Smiling with happiness or optimism- Lewis Carroll
verbs: Change one's facial expression by spreading the lips, often to signal pleasure
nouns: Feeling that something unexpected has happened.
Unexpected.
A sudden unexpected event
Part of the body at the front of the head
The face is a central organ of sense and is also very central in the expression of emotion among humans and among numerous other species.
Faces are the central sense organ complexes, for those animals that have one, normally on the ventral surface of the head.
The front of the human head from the forehead to the chin and ear to ear
The front part of the head, featuring the eyes, nose, and mouth and the surrounding area.
Mouths are a part of the anatomy constituting the first portion of the alimentary canal that receives food and saliva.
The opening through which food is taken in and vocalizations emerge
A body cavity
First portion of the alimentary canal that receives food

In biological anatomy, commonly referred to as the mouth, under formal names such as the oral cavity, buccal cavity, or in Latin cavum oris, is the opening through which many animals take in food and issue vocal sounds.
Cavity that is limited by the lips in front, the cheeks on the side, the soft and hard palate at the top and the floor of the mouth below.
Mouth
The opening of a creature through which food is ingested.
Perception, understanding, and reaction to the distress or need of another human being
In psychology, a feeling of compassion or identification with another
A feeling of pity or sorrow for the suffering or distress of another; compassion.
Sharing the feelings of others (especially feelings of sorrow or anguish)
The sharing of another's emotions, especially of sorrow or anguish; pity; compassion.
Sympathy is a social affinity in which one person stands with another person, closely understanding his or her feelings.
Feeling of pity or sorrow for the suffering or distress of another.
Sympathy is the perception, understanding, and reaction to the distress or need of another human being.

description: A yellow face with small, open eyes and a large, round mouth, slack with surprise or shock, as if saying Wow! or Oh my! May convey such feelings as awe or disbelief, often milder or more ironic in tone than ðŸ˜± Face Screaming in Fear.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's face with open mouth emoji radiates surprise and excitement, with wide, expressive eyes and a distinctly open, rounded mouth that suggests a gasp or exclamation. The smooth, glossy finish and realistic lighting on Apple devices give this emoji a lively, almost animated quality. It's commonly used on Apple devices to convey astonishment, shock, or a sudden burst of unexpected news.
